conversations.body_text: I paid more for postage to get it faster and now I don't even know if it will come to me or if it has even been sent
Hi Jan Ylitalo,  We apologize that due to our oversight, we were unable to ship your order on time. We have now submitted your order and will update the tracking information for you by tomorrow.
